TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在用户按下鼠标按钮而指针在控件上时发生。The event occurs when the user presses the mouse button while the pointer is over a control. 时用户松开鼠标按钮而指针保持该控件在事件发生。The event occurs when the user releases the mouse button while the pointer remains over the control. 用户将鼠标指针移到控件上时发生事件。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over a control. A指定哪个鼠标按钮按下多少次按下并释放鼠标按钮的鼠标，以及鼠标滚轮移动的量的坐标。A specifies which mouse button is pressed, how many times the mouse button was pressed and released, the coordinates of the mouse, and the amount the mouse wheel moved. 可以接收而没有相应的事件，如果用户将焦点切换到另一个应用程序，然后松开鼠标按钮。It is possible to receive a event without a corresponding , if the user switches focus to another application before releasing the mouse button. 这三个事件存在， ，和类。These three events exist for the , , and classes. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理上的事件控制，以便单击鼠标右键按钮控件中选择所有文本。The following code examples handles the event on a control so that clicking the right mouse button selects all the text in the control. 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体控件名为`textBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control that is named `textBox1`. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用`Location`属性来跟踪单击鼠标左键并绘制一系列直线段对用户输入的响应。The following code example uses the `Location` property to track clicks of the left mouse button and to draw a series of straight line segments in response to user input. 该示例不会刷新行，如果你隐藏窗体，然后重新显示;为简单起见，此代码已被省略。The example does not redraw the lines if you hide the form and then redisplay it; this code has been omitted for simplicity. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例使用和属性，以显示在鼠标指针的当前位置窗口。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理上的事件控制，以便单击鼠标右键按钮控件中选择所有文本。The following code example handles the event on a control so that clicking the right mouse button selects all the text in the control. 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体控件名为`textBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `textBox1`. summary.span: 获取按下并释放鼠标按钮的次数。

span.span: Gets the number of times the mouse button was pressed and released.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含按下并释放鼠标按钮的次数。

span.span: An that contains the number of times the mouse button was pressed and released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 Windows 界面定义标准鼠标事件作为单击或双击，单个应用程序可以解释为单个事件更多的单击。Although the Windows interface defines standard mouse events as either single-clicks or double-clicks, individual applications can interpret a larger number of clicks as a single event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表有助于您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

public: property int Delta { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取鼠标轮已转动的制动器数的有符号计数乘以 WHEEL_DELTA 常数。

span.span: Gets a signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.

summary.span: 制动器是鼠标轮的一个凹口。

span.span: A detent is one notch of the mouse wheel.

value.span: 鼠标轮已转动的制动器数的有符号计数乘以 WHEEL_DELTA 常数。

span.span: A signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标滚轮结合轮的鼠标和鼠标按钮的功能。The mouse wheel combines the features of a wheel and a mouse button. 鼠标轮有一些离散、 间距均匀凹口。The wheel has discrete, evenly spaced notches. 当在旋转鼠标滚轮时，遇到每个齿格发送一个鼠标轮消息。When you rotate the wheel, a wheel message is sent as each notch is encountered. 一个滚轮陷波，制动器定义由 windows 常量 WHEEL_DELTA，后者是 120。One wheel notch, a detent, is defined by the windows constant WHEEL_DELTA, which is 120. 正值指示，鼠标轮已转动转发 （远离用户）;负值指示，鼠标轮已转动向后 （向用户）。A positive value indicates that the wheel was rotated forward (away from the user); a negative value indicates that the wheel was rotated backward (toward the user). 目前，值为 120 是一个制动器的标准。Currently, a value of 120 is the standard for one detent. 如果将引入更高版本的解析 mice，WHEEL_DELTA 的定义可能会变得更小。If higher resolution mice are introduced, the definition of WHEEL_DELTA might become smaller. 大多数应用程序应检查正数或负数的值，而不是聚合总数。Most applications should check for a positive or negative value rather than an aggregate total. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表有助于您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

summary.span: 获取鼠标在产生鼠标事件时的位置。

span.span: Gets the location of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含鼠标相对于窗体左上角的 x 坐标和 y 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: A that contains the x- and y- mouse coordinates, in pixels, relative to the upper-left corner of the form.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来跟踪鼠标左键的单击和绘制一系列直线段对用户输入的响应。The following code example uses the property to track left mouse clicks and draw a series of straight line segments in response to user input. 该示例不会保留绘制的行，如果你隐藏窗体，然后重新显示;为简单起见，此代码已被省略。The example does not persist the drawn lines if you hide the form and then redisplay it; this code was omitted for simplicity. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取鼠标在产生鼠标事件时的 x 坐标。

span.span: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 鼠标的 X 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标坐标取决于要引发事件。The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised. 例如，当处理事件、 鼠标坐标值是相对于引发事件的控件的坐标。For example, when the event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event. 一些与拖放操作相关的事件具有关联的相对于窗体原点或屏幕原点的鼠标坐标值。Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse-coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和属性，以显示在鼠标指针的当前位置窗口。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取鼠标在产生鼠标事件时的 y 坐标。

span.span: Gets the y-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 鼠标的 Y 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标坐标取决于要引发事件。The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised. 例如，当处理事件、 鼠标坐标值是相对于引发事件的控件的坐标。For example, when the event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event. 与拖放操作相关的一些事件具有关联相对于窗体原点或屏幕原点的鼠标坐标值。Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和属性，以显示在鼠标指针的当前位置窗口。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. 若要使用此代码，调用`TrackCoordinates`从窗体构造函数。To use this code, call `TrackCoordinates` from the form constructor. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]
